strapiEdition.headline: We Put The Fun in Funnel Cakes

posts.title: BITE Experience @ the LPGA Tickets On Sale Now
posts.content:
The BITE Experience @ the LPGA returns to the #NWAChampionship this year as the tournament‚Äôs onsite food festival, promising a weekend full of fun and flavor from Sep 29-Oct 1.

Wine & Dine: Through this signature culinary experience, spectators will have the opportunity to sample the best local restaurants the region has to offer. BITE Experience ticket buyers receive access to both a golf-viewing deck and expanded courtyard space.

New Flavors: New in 2023, each day of the BITE Experience will highlight a variety of diverse-owned restaurants and eateries through strategic partnerships with community organizations like Black-Owned NWA and NWA Equality.

Tickets are on sale now for $45. Reserve your spot HERE.

posts.title: Distinguished Development Brings Contemporary Living to the Core of Downtown Bentonville
posts.content:
Sophistication and location intersect at the new SEG4 Townhome Community, offering a distinguished, luxury townhome lifestyle in the heart of Bentonville‚Äôs Market District ‚Äî just a stroll away from The Momentary and 8th St Market.

Urban & Urbane: SEG4 offers one or 2-bedroom floorplans with superior quality finishes in a cultivated, cosmopolitan environment located at 402 SE G St. ‚Äî making your doorstep a gateway into the many trails, parks, dining, and entertainment options of Downtown Bentonville.

See it & Believe it: Explore this distinguished new development and marvel for yourself during an Open House Happy Hour this Friday, Aug 25, from 3-5.

Find SEG4 photos and floorplans HERE.

posts.title: Celebrate the End of Summer at Arkansas‚Äôs Largest County Fair
posts.content:
It's time for Ferris wheels, funnel cakes, petting zoos, and more as the Washington County Fair takes off this week, open from 10a-10p daily from Aug 22-26.

State Title: Founded in 1857, the Washington County Fair is Arkansas's largest county fair. Enjoy carnival rides, cheer on Miss Washington County Fair Pageant participants, and enjoy free petting zoos. There‚Äôs something for everyone!

Join the Fun: Admission is $5 cash or $7.50 card per person for ages six and up. Children under five are admitted for free, and armbands with unlimited ride access can be purchased for $30. On Friday, the carnival will stay open until 2a for Midnight Madness!

For more information, click HERE.

posts.title: Botanical Garden of the Ozarks Hosts Summer Garden Flea Market
posts.content:
This week‚Äôs Terrific Tuesday event at the Botanical Garden of the Ozarks will feature local businesses in a Summer Garden Flea Market. Join the free, family-friendly event in the Garden on Aug 8 from 5-9:30p.

Those Summer Nights: The Terrific Tuesday Nights series invites the Northwest Arkansas community to experience the Garden on beautiful summer evenings free of charge, thanks to the generous support of the Pat & Willard Walker Foundation.

Shop & Snack: Find locally crafted goods during this vendor pop-up in the Garden and support our community‚Äôs diverse artisans and makers. Food will be available for purchase from Taqueria El Chuko Tex Mex and Burton‚Äôs Creamery!

The event is free, but you must reserve tickets HERE.
